0: When we asked about cabanas they told us everything we needed to know and put us in a great location right by the waterfall in the pool grotto
The pool is beautiful and is like a mini labyrinth
The pool area is beautiful with a lovely lazy river
The room was clean fun pool everyone was so friendly and the best view ever
We upgraded our rooms to face the ocean and away from the pool
Pool is great and just steps from the beach
The server by the pool the next day was really nice and attentive
Good polside bar and very close to beach
Really enjoyed the Hotel was really expensive for what you get but the pool grounds and beach is amazing
Grounds are well kept and a big attraction is the resort pool
1: Winding pool was cool but seats limited
No shuttle restaurants closed pool was practically public

If you plan to relax by the pool or beach this is not the resort for youWe did eat and purchase beverages at the grill by the pool and the food was okay but the service was slow and bordered on completely non attentive
Which how does she know what our swimming level is
You are charged for the use of the pool in all the fees but they do n’t bother to inform you before you check in that the pool is freezing
The ONLY redeeming quality was the pools
The bad was the room had 3 different problems which we brought up to the resortthe pool has also seen better days the walls are crumbling in a couple of places
I was surprised to hear 2 weeks before our trip that 2 of 5 pools were closed for renovations including the water slides
Other than the pool area I have no idea what the 30 plus tax daily resort fee really covers as I did not see a lot of other offerings entertainment amenties to justify it
The pool area was way too quiet no music or nightlife at all
